wikitext.*:
'''William "Bill" J. C. Amend III''' ([[20 September|September 20]], [[1962]]) is an American cartoonist with a major in physics at [[wikipedia:Amherst College|Amherst College]]. He is famed for ''FoxTrot'', which appeared in papers daily until [[2006]] (and weekly after that). Along with influences from ''Star Wars'' and ''Star Trek'', many references to Tolkien's works are made.
